Package XXLChess

Class Bot

java.lang.Object
XXLChess.PlayerAgent
XXLChess.Bot
All Implemented Interfaces:
Tickable
public class Bot extends PlayerAgent
This class represents a computer player (bot) in the chess game. It extends the abstract PlayerAgent class and provides a method for making a decision on the next move.

  • Constructor Details

    • Bot

      public Bot(Piece.Color color, int remainingTime, int timeIncrement)
      Constructor for the Bot class.
      Parameters:
      color - The color of the bot's pieces.
      remainingTime - The initial remaining time for the bot's turns.
      timeIncrement - The time increment after each move.

  • Method Details

    • makeDecision

      public Movement makeDecision(Game ctx)
      Make a decision on the next move. The strategy is to choose a random move from the set of legal moves that do not lead to a threat against the king. If no such moves exist, return null.
      Parameters:
      ctx - The current game context.
      Returns:
      The selected move, or null if no safe moves are possible.

      public BotAIStrategy getStrategy()
